ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Newbie Bard needs hunting suggestions
ygData.msgSnippet: Woah!!! ... be ... with ... Evulia, What system are you using?  If you re having problems in Blackburrow you really need to consider upgrading your system.
ygData.messageBody:
Woah!!!

> you feel Blackburrow is such a good dungeon for bards. I've found it to
be
> lag-city (2 song max) and have not been able to successfully hunt there
with

> Peace
> Evulia, bard of 11 missed notes, Ro/Commons/Thicket, Tunare

Evulia,

What system are you using? If you're having problems in Blackburrow you
really need to consider upgrading your system. The lag there should be
minimal, if any. If you're having that kind of problem in Blackburrow I
dread to think how bad kunark is going to be for you :( Might want to
consider picking up a TNT 2 Ultra with 32mb ram. You can get them for a
song these days (around $70-$150) and maybe some more ram for your computer
(128mb ram is great for EQ)

Just some helpful hints. If you're having that much trouble with BB I'd
suspect your system is kind of lower-end.

Hope this is helpful.

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath
